aboutSection.whyTitle: Why clients choose us for piercing in Chisinau?

why.title: 100% sterility
why.text: We use a Class B autoclave, single-use needles, and follow all medical protocols. Every instrument undergoes a full sterilization cycle.

why.title: Certified piercers

why.title: No hidden fees
why.text: The jewelry is included in the piercing price and is installed during the procedure. You pay for the final result, not for separate items on the price list.

hero.lead: If you want to master a creative, in-demand profession, join our tattoo course in Chi»ôinƒÉu, permanent makeup training, and the piercing course in Chi»ôinƒÉu. All courses suit both beginners and practicing artists looking to upskill.

overview.title: Course overview
paragraphs: Our courses provide comprehensive training in Chi»ôinƒÉu, giving you a strong theoretical base and confident practical skills.
From day one you work with real models under an experienced master‚Äôs guidance. Training takes place in a salon with professional equipment.

curriculum.title: What‚Äôs included in the course
items: Types of tools and their purpose (needles, cartridges, machines, etc.)

tattoo.title: Tattoo course in Chi»ôinƒÉu

certificates.title: Certificates and Diplomas
paragraphs: Upon completion of the course, each student receives an official diploma and certificate confirming the training.
By default, the documents are issued in two languages‚ÄîRomanian and English‚Äîwhich allows you to use them both in Moldova and abroad.
If desired, a student can request an additional diploma in another language‚Äîfor example, German, Italian, French, etc.
The diploma is coded and recognized in most European countries, which opens up additional opportunities for working abroad.
